title.rendered: Quantiphi collaborates with Smile Foundation for Women Engineering Scholarship Programme

content.rendered:
Quantiphi collaborates with Smile Foundation for Women Engineering Scholarship Programme

Quantiphi’s Women Engineering Education Network (QWEEN) Scholarship was launched in January 2022. Quantiphi, a leading data and analytics solutions company, and Smile Foundation joined hands to promote gender diversity in the field of engineering and providing financial support to girl students from underprivileged communities. In the first year, through an intensive unground mobilization 30 girls were identified in Bengaluru and Mumbai locations. These students are pursuing various IT, Computer Science engineering and allied stream degrees programmes in recognized universities or institutions. In 2022, under the QWEEN initiative, another 15 girls from PAN India locations have started thier scholarship journey.
